rules.justification: The manifest property must be specified and contain a meaningful value. The value of the property might be displayed to users in the AppSource marketplace.
The ID range assigned to the extension must be within the range allowed for AppSource applications.
ALWAYS IGNORE:variáveis com mesmo nome de método ou campo no mesmo contexto
ALWAYS IGNORE: Adicionar SIFT nos flowfields - INFO -
The 'applicationInsightsKey' property must specify the instrumentation key of the Azure Application Insights resource for monitoring operations related to this extension.
ALWAYS IGNORE (+4391): Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements. - apenas avisa de begin end desnescessários
ALWAYS IGNORE: Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo. - Para já não é urgente Microsoft tb usa este tipo de artifícios - VER MAIS TARDE
VERY HARD (+3000): The name is not valid. The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name. - ignorar a não ser que passe a ser impeditivo
VERY HARD (+2000): Variable must have a suffix from this list: Msg, Tok, Err, Qst, Lbl, Txt - ignorar a não ser que passe a ser impeditivo
ALWAYS IGNORE: Placeholders should have a comment explaining their content. - identificar com comentário os %1 e %2
ALWAYS IGNORE: variable declarations should be ordered by type. - ignorar a não ser que passe a ser impeditivo
The member referenced by event subscriber 'CheckItemLdgEntries' parameter 'ItemNo' is not found. - ignorar a não ser que passe a ser impeditivo
